body_html:
Few more info to reproduce:
I am using Mac OSX El Captain and TF 0.6

I installed in this way:
$ sudo easy_install pip
$ sudo pip install --upgrade virtualenv
$ virtualenv --system-site-packages /Users/marcotrombetti/Documents/tensorflow-python-env (io ho creato una cartella in Documents)
$ source /Users/marcotrombetti/Documents/tensorflow-python-env/bin/activate
$ sudo pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.6.0-py2-none-any.whl (Please note that the url is different compared to the documentation)

Files have been installed here:
/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/rnn/translate/

At one point, I was missing the translate.py files (not sure if this was only related to a 0.5 problem), anyway I got it from here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/models/rnn/translate/translate.py

@vnkmr7620 did you test on a different configuration and/or release?

body:
Few more info to reproduce:
I am using Mac OSX El Captain and TF 0.6

I installed in this way:
$ sudo easy_install pip
$ sudo pip install --upgrade virtualenv
$ virtualenv --system-site-packages /Users/marcotrombetti/Documents/tensorflow-python-env (io ho creato una cartella in Documents) 
$ source /Users/marcotrombetti/Documents/tensorflow-python-env/bin/activate  
$ sudo pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.6.0-py2-none-any.whl (Please note that the url is different compared to the documentation)

Files have been installed here:
/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/rnn/translate/

At one point,  I was missing the translate.py files (not sure if this was only related to a 0.5 problem), anyway I got it from here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/models/rnn/translate/translate.py

@vnkmr7620 did you test on a different configuration and/or release?
